title: (g
clause_text: (g.) Confectioneries and establishments for the preparation and sale of eatables not occupying for production, an area in excess of 75 sq. m per establishment and not employing more than 9 persons or motive power exceeding 1.12 KW, as well as sugarcane and fruit crushers, each not employing more than 6 persons with motive power not exceeding 1.12 KW, in an area not more than 25 sq. m.
section: Additional facilities in the Development in Large Holding/layout
